titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Butralin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/14/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on (N-sec-butyl-4-tert- butyl-2,6-dinitroaniline) and any mixtures containing same.
